title: 2015 Richard D James/Aphex Twin 59 albums+rarities
description:
The most expansive Richard D. James discography on the net!!

Includes Soundcloud playlists (as well as deleted ones from the official Soundcloud).

These are unorganized in the folder but organized in iTunes.

I have a general rule of chucking any track from an album/EP with less than three tracks, anything off a V/A release, anything off an album consisting mostly of pre-released material, and any loosies, under 'unknown album'. Sorry if that bothers anybody, the rest is organized very neatly!

I also generally organized albums based on the vinyls; I find it better because the disc 1/disc 2 distinctions are more compatible with my attention span. Again, sorry if this bugs anyone. 

This does not contain Mike Dred's Universal Indicator tracks, only Rich's.

Albums/EPs included:
*1991 - AFX - Analogue Bubblebath
*1991 - AFX - Analogue Bubblebath, Vol. 2
*1992 - The Aphex Twin - Didgeridoo
*1992 - Caustic Window - Joyrex J4
